Contributor: Forain, Jean-Louis, 1852-1931, artist.; SOCte des ÉTABL.ts Minot, publisher.;
Note: Signed "Forain" (?) Date based on dates of the 1st World War. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Text in French asks for help for the Red Cross to provide the bread of life for the prisoners of the war. Red Cross asks for bread, linens, clothes and shoes. Illustration shows a small Red Cross. A sketch also appears to show a man sitting with his hand on his head as he writes a letter.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Le vêtement du prisonnier de guerre
